name: BourbonSelector
0:
”Alexa, open Bourbon Selector”
”Alexa, start Bourbon Selector”
skdetail:
Rated: Mature. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: bourbon selector
des:
ABOUT BOURBON SELECTOR 

With so many bourbon and whiskey options to choose from, and more popping up on the shelf every day, you may find it overwhelming when deciding which bottle to purchase or try. Our goal is to create a tool to help you select the best bourbon or whiskey that suits your needs and maximizes your tasting experience. This skill will ask you to choose a "wheated bourbon", "traditional bourbon", or a "rye bourbon" and then a specific bottle is selected for you. Each selection will give you the distiller or producer, the mash bill, the price tier, the proof, and other information about the selection. Enjoy!

www.BourbonSelector.com
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
